key Responsibilities-
1.Making Bills (Shuttering, Concrete, Reinforcement), BOQ, BBS, MB, Work Charts and 
Reports.
2.Checking shuttering and quality.
3.Checking reinforcement and Casting.
4.Checking level and Quality of sewer line/Manholes.
5.Deal with clients in Inspections and Meetings.
6.Monitoring work progress and daily update to the superior through written & tele conferencing.
7.To ensure that the Civil Work/Sewer Line Installation/Mould is going on according to the 
Approved Drawings.
8.Identify options and recommend solutions to resolve technical issues.
9.Attending project site selection studies.
10.Mentoring and supervising junior staff.
11.Compiling, checking and approving reports.
12.Ensuring that all assigned work is completed on time and within agreed budgets.
13.Working closely with all levels of management, engineers and field operations staff.
14.Providing support in the preparation of technical reports, cost estimates and contract 
documentation.
15.Participating in technical site surveys.
16.Dealing with complaints from local people experiencing disruption due to building works.
